name: prod_rev
description: The program should calculate the product of all the elements of the array b and store it in p. Note that the product of 0 elements is equal to 1.
invariant: -1 <= i < n && (A k : 0 <= k < n : b[k] = B[k]) && p = (PROD k : i < k < n : B[k])
simplifyPrefix: (BG_PUSH (FORALL (a b) (EQ (* a b) (* b a)))) (BG_PUSH (FORALL (b i j) (AND (IMPLIES (> i j) (EQ (prod b i j) 1) ) (IMPLIES (<= i j) (EQ (prod b i j) (* (select b i) (prod b (+ i 1) j)))))))
